signature.embedding_text: If a student multiplied a number by X/X instead of X/X, then find error in calculation in %

trick.name: Fraction Error Shortcut
trick.one_liner: Galat bhinn se multiply karne par error percentage kaise nikalein

steps.action: Assume the original number is X
steps.action_hi: मान लीजिए मूल संख्या X है

steps.action: Calculate correct multiplication using correct fraction
steps.action_hi: सही भिन्न का उपयोग करके सही गुणा कीजिए

steps.action: Calculate incorrect multiplication using incorrect fraction
steps.action_hi: गलत भिन्न का उपयोग करके गलत गुणा कीजिए
गणना में त्रुटि का पता लगाएं

trick.memory_hook: Remember: Incorrect fraction se error percentage nikalne ka easy tareeka!

common_mistakes.mistake: Students often forget to simplify the fractions
common_mistakes.why: Simplification helps in reducing calculation errors

deep.explanation: Fraction multiplication errors are common in exams. Jab student galat fraction se multiply karta hai, toh error percentage nikalna zaroori hota hai. Pehle correct aur incorrect multiplication ko compare karo, fir error ko percentage mein convert karo. Ye trick aapko jaldi aur sahi answer dene mein madad karegi.

shortcut.explanation: Fraction error ko jaldi se solve karne ke liye pehle correct aur incorrect fraction ko compare karo, fir error percentage nikal lo.

instant.explanation: Galat fraction se multiply karne par 15% error aata hai.
